Generated by DocFX

Class BlacklistService

Manages a blacklist to control access or actions within the bot's environment, offering functionality to add, remove, and check entities against a blacklist.

Inheritance

BlacklistService(DbService, IPubSub, EventHandler, DiscordSocketClient)

Initializes a new instance of the BlacklistService class, setting up listeners for guild joins and the bot's readiness, and preloading the blacklist.

Declaration
public BlacklistService(DbService db, IPubSub pubSub, EventHandler handler, DiscordSocketClient client)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DbService db

The database service to access persistence layer.
IPubSub pubSub

The publish-subscribe service for inter-service communication.
EventHandler handler

Event handler for listening to Discord client events.
DiscordSocketClient client

The Discord socket client instance.
Remarks

The service subscribes to relevant events to automatically enforce blacklist rules upon guild join events or when the bot starts.

Methods

| Edit this page View Source

Blacklist(BlacklistType, ulong, string?)

Blacklists the specified entity based on the provided type, ID, and reason.

Declaration
public void Blacklist(BlacklistType type, ulong id, string? reason)
Parameters
Type Name Description
BlacklistType type

The type of entity to blacklist.
ulong id

The ID of the entity to blacklist.
string reason

The reason for blacklisting the entity.
Remarks

This method adds the entity to the blacklist and reloads the blacklist to ensure the changes are reflected.

| Edit this page View Source

BlacklistUsers(IEnumerable<ulong>)

Adds a list of users to the blacklist.

Declaration
public void BlacklistUsers(IEnumerable<ulong> toBlacklist)
Parameters
Type Name Description
IEnumerable<ulong> toBlacklist

The list of user IDs to be added to the blacklist.
Remarks

This method adds the specified users to the blacklist, clears their currencies, and then reloads the blacklist to ensure the changes are reflected.

| Edit this page View Source

Reload(bool)

Reloads the blacklist from the database, optionally publishing a notification about the update.

Declaration
public void Reload(bool publish = true)
Parameters
Type Name Description
bool publish

Whether to publish a notification about the blacklist reload.
| Edit this page View Source

RunBehavior(DiscordSocketClient, IGuild, IUserMessage)

Evaluates whether the incoming message should be blocked based on the blacklist status of the user, channel, or guild.

Declaration
public Task<bool> RunBehavior(DiscordSocketClient socketClient, IGuild guild, IUserMessage usrMsg)
Parameters
Type Name Description
DiscordSocketClient socketClient

The Discord socket client instance.
IGuild guild

The guild from which the message originated, if applicable.
IUserMessage usrMsg

The user message to be evaluated against the blacklist.
Returns
Type Description
Task<bool>

A task that resolves to true if the message should be blocked; otherwise, false.
Remarks

This method allows the service to act as a pre-message processing step, blocking messages from blacklisted entities.

| Edit this page View Source

SendManualCheck()

Signals a manual check of the blacklist across all guilds.

Declaration
public Task SendManualCheck()
Returns
Type Description
Task

A task that represents the asynchronous operation of signaling the manual blacklist check.
Remarks

This method is designed to be invoked by administrators to force a manual re-evaluation of all guilds against the blacklist.

| Edit this page View Source

UnBlacklist(BlacklistType, ulong)

Removes an entity from the blacklist.

Declaration
public void UnBlacklist(BlacklistType type, ulong id)
Parameters
Type Name Description
BlacklistType type

The type of the entity to be removed from the blacklist.
ulong id

The ID of the entity to be removed from the blacklist.
Remarks

This method removes the specified entity from the blacklist and then reloads the blacklist to ensure the changes are reflected.
